price: 18. Ma mid mu'min ah baa la mid ah mid caasi ah? Ma ay sinna.
arabic: أَفَمَن كَانَ مُؤۡمِنٗا كَمَن كَانَ فَاسِقٗاۚ لَّا يَسۡتَوُۥنَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: afaman kāna mu'minan kaman kāna fāsiqan lā yastawūna
